name: Mechanical Heart Failure
description:
A caregiver robot finds itself dismantled in an abandoned house with no memory of what happened.  By using its limited resources, it must collect its remaining modules and restore its memory card.  This game can be played with keyboard or XBOX controller.

Keyboard Controls:

Left Shift - Go forward

Left Ctrl - Go backward

WASD - Point forward, back, left, and right

Left and Right Arrow Keys - Rotate camera left and right

Left Click: Throw object

Right Click: Pick up object

Controller:

Right Trigger -  Go forward

Left Trigger - Go backward

Left Stick - Rotate in direction

Right Stick - Rotate camera

A - Throw object

B - Pick up object
